00001 package citation.ui;
00002 
00003 import javax.microedition.location.QualifiedCoordinates;
00004 
00005 import net.rim.blackberry.api.invoke.Invoke;
00006 import net.rim.blackberry.api.invoke.MapsArguments;
00007 import net.rim.blackberry.api.maps.MapView;
00008 import net.rim.device.api.ui.component.ButtonField;
00009 
00010 public class MapButtonField extends ButtonField {
00011 
00012         private int lat = 4542349;
00013         private int lon = -7569792;
00014         private int zoomRatio = 2;
00015         
00016     public MapButtonField(String fieldValue, long consumeClick) {
00017                 super(fieldValue, consumeClick);
00018         }
00019 
00020         public void run() 
00021     {
00022         MapView mapview = new MapView();
00023         mapview.setLatitude(lat);
00024         mapview.setLongitude(lon);
00025         mapview.setZoom(this.zoomRatio);
00026         
00027         // Invoke maps application with specified MapView.
00028         Invoke.invokeApplication(Invoke.APP_TYPE_MAPS, new MapsArguments(mapview));
00029     }
00030 
00031         public void setCoordinates(QualifiedCoordinates _where) {
00032                 if (_where != null)
00033                 {
00034                         lat = (int)(_where.getLatitude() * 100000);
00035                         lon = (int)(_where.getLongitude() * 100000);
00036                 }
00037         }
00038 
00039         public void setZoom(int zoom) {
00040                 this.zoomRatio = zoom;
00041         }
00042 
00043 }
